channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: $22M of Curve Finance algo stablecoin minted since mainnet launch
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: Decentralized finance protocol CurveDAO has successfully launched its algorithmic stablecoin crvUSD on the Ethereum network.

item.title: SEC steps back from defining digital assets in new hedge fund rules
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: The SEC and its staff are “continuing to consider” the term “digital assets” despite proposing a definition of the term around nine months ago.

item.title: ChatGPT and AI the newest vector for malware: Meta security team
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: Security researchers at Meta said “bad actors” have flocked to generative AI because it’s the latest tech to capture “people’s imagination and excitement.”

item.title: 36% of the top 1,000 crypto projects went silent on blogging this year
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: A whopping 35.8% of the world’s largest crypto projects haven’t uploaded a single blog post in 2023, according to blockchain marketing agency Guerilla Buzz.

item.title: FTX seeks to claw back $4B from Genesis in a battle of the bankrupt
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: The bankrupt crypto exchange wants to recoup billions from the bankrupt crypto lender claiming it was “instrumental” to FTX’s “fraudulent” business model.

item.title: Jury convicts former OpenSea manager in NFT-insider trading case
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: Prosecutors claimed Nathaniel Chastain profited from inside information about which NFTs would be featured on the marketplace.

item.title: Google DeepMind CEO Demis Hassabis says we may have AGI ‘in the next few years’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: The CEO of Google DeepMind says human-level AI could emerge before 2033 — an event that could radically alter how crypto trading bots and GPT-based tech functions.

item.title: State regulators crack down on fraudulent cryptos promoted as 'Elon Musk AI Token' and 'TruthGPT Coin'
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Judith BannermanQuist
item.description: According to the cease and desist order, investors are being given the impression that Elon Musk endorses "TruthGPT Coin."

item.title: Robinhood returns to court to defend position in case brought by US state regulator
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The Massachusetts Secretary of the Commonwealth's office filed a complaint against Robinhood in December 2020 alleging the platform was in violation of the state’s fiduciary duty standards.

item.title: Digitalization won’t displace commercial bank money any time soon: Moody’s
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: Even as digitalization increases, the commercial bank’s place in the economy is solid and will be supported by some new forms of money, the credit rating agency said.

item.title: The Fed has little ammo left as $30K Bitcoin price becomes key battle line
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: BTC options and futures markets show no use of excessive leverage from buyers, a healthy indicator as the $28,000 support gets retested.

item.title: French Senate proposal would allow influencers to promote cryptocurrency
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: The Senate’s proposal comes just months after the National Assembly floated legislation banning influencer advertising for crypto products and services.

item.title: Sotheby’s launches on-chain secondary NFT marketplace: Nifty Newsletter, April 26–May 2
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Sotheby’s marketplace will attempt to set itself apart by presenting a range of artists curated by experts from the auction house.

item.title: Securities token platform launches MPC wallet for institutions
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The Web3 wallet allows institutions to control which employees are allowed to use the tokens held within it.

item.title: Mashinsky files motion to dismiss NY AG suit, says it ‘parrots misinformation’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: Former Celsius CEO Alex Mashinsky was charged with seven counts of fraud in connection with “false and misleading statements” about his company, among other things.

item.title: US lawmakers introduce bipartisan bill proposing ban on members investing in ‘financial instruments’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Representatives Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez and Matt Gaetz — lawmakers diametrically opposed on a variety of issues — joined forces to stop congressional members from trading stocks.

item.title: Fuse blockchain pledges $10M for ecosystem development
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: Grants valuing between $5,000 and $25,000 will be allocated to qualifying project teams.

item.title: Price analysis 5/3: BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, ADA, DOGE, MATIC, SOL, DOT, LTC
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: Bitcoin and select altcoins are showing a continuation pattern, indicating indecision among the bulls and the bears.

item.title: What are convolutional neural networks?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jagjit Singh
item.description: Convolutional neural networks (CNNs) are a class of deep neural networks widely used in computer vision applications such as image recognition.

item.title: 3 signs PEPE token is about to trap bulls after 2,000% price rally
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.description: PEPE price risks losing 20% in May due to shaky technicals, waning retail interest and possible market manipulation.

item.title: Bitcoin limps into FOMC as flagging volume adds to BTC price hurdles
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin’s price looks unlikely to break out as markets brace for Fed rate hike volatility.

item.title: Will compromise on anonymous crypto appease US regulators, spur adoption?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Andrew Singer
item.description: Asking exchanges to identify users might seem like a minor inconvenience, but could it drive DeFi firms overseas, and would crypto users even care?

item.title: NFT art pioneer wants to upload her brain so she can live forever: Josie Bellini, NFT Creator
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Greg Oakford
item.description: NFT art pioneer Josie Bellini has already ensure her on-chain art can live forever — and she wants to upload her brain to the Metaverse too.

item.title: Hollywood studios reject banning AI from writer’s rooms
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: The Writers Guild of America sent out a list of demands to Hollywood studios, including regulating AI usage in guild-affiliated projects.

item.title: Flare integrates blockchain API on Google Cloud Marketplace
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: Google Cloud Marketplace adds support for nine different blockchain APIs, including Bitcoin and Ethereum, through integration with layer-1 Oracle network Flare.

item.title: New Cosmos chain will use liquid staking tokens from other networks for security
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: Staked ETH, BNB, ATOM, SOL and MATIC will be usable on Tenet as “restakes” to gain further rewards.

item.title: SUI mainnet goes live as token sees immediate action on Binance, OKX, others
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: The total supply of the SUI token is capped at 10 billion coins, with tokens running on a delegated proof-of-stake consensus algorithm.

item.title: Litecoin price poised for 700% gains vs. Bitcoin, says Charlie Lee
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.description: The Litecoin halving is just three months away, with the LTC price well-positioned for massive gains, argues the founder.

item.title: Coinbase going international sparks community reactions: ‘Crypto is global’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Reactions to the new development varied, with some celebrating and others expressing frustration toward U.S. regulators.

item.title: Bitcoin BRC-20 token standard becomes new destination for meme tokens
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The BRC-20 token market cap has seen a 600% rise in the past week, with its transaction volume overtaking standard BTC transactions on the network.
